work.name: Fidelity Investments
highlights: Architect: iterated over UX designs and product requirements, architected and implemented seamless isomorphic solutions using Angular and Node.js within a 2-week Agile sprint cycle
Test: achieved 100% code coverage with Jest and Jasmine, automated integration tests and system tests with Selenium and Karate
Release: planned a series of Minimum Viable Products, created rollout plans, conducted A/B testing, and deployed production installs with Jenkins and Planit
Post-release: managed feature toggles and collected metrics in LaunchDarkly, monitored Splunk dashboards for on-call support

work.name: CGI
highlights: Utilized React-window for lazy loading, leveraged Reselect to optimize expensive function calls and compute derived data from the Redux store state
Designed RESTful APIs with Node.js for HR applications and created validations on JSON forms

work.name: Cisco Systems
highlights: Developed Android Webex's calling features, achieving 100% code coverage with Espresso
Deployed a Jenkins pipeline in CI/CD to automate end-to-end tests, reducing testing time by 40%

work.name: SenseTime Group
highlights: Developed a shared Vue component library, facilitating cross-team reuse through dependency injection
Enhanced the performance of ultra-high-resolution images using Openseadragon, a JavaScript library known for its multi-layer zoom capability, resulting in an 83.3% improvement in efficiency

work.name: Lenovo Research
highlights: Developed LeData to manage image and video training data, improving the efficiency of classification model training by 76%
